title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.
highlights: pull & run GGUF models with one command

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API; sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama as an LLM backend in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with local Ollama models; markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chats.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit cookbook showing how to build a chat UI backed by Ollama models in minutes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings and listing models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API with async support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats and answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that plugs Ollama models into channels/DMs with streaming replies.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a NixOS module for declarative local LLM servers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with strongly-typed chat and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes a REST chat endpoint backed by Ollama with CORS and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama with session memory and model switcher.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with tokio and serde.
